summary: 3 women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.
cast: Chris O'Donnell|Minnie Driver|Geraldine O'Rawe|Saffron Burrows|Alan Cumming|Colin Firth|Aidan Gillen|Mick Lally|Britta Smith|John Kavanagh|Ruth McCabe|Ciarán Hinds|Tony Doyle|Marie Mullen|Marie Conmee|Gerry Walsh|Sean McGinley|Tom Hickey|Seamus Forde|Ingrid Craigie|Major Lambert|Pauline Delaney|Jason Barry|Edward Manning|Phil Kelly|Gwynne McElveen|Marguerite Drea|Stephen Rooney|Cathy Belton|Elizabeth Keller|Tanya Cawley|Niamh O'Byrne|Dearbhla O'Farrell|Pamela Cardillo|Louise Maher|Karen O'Neill|Elaine Dunphy|Emma Lannon|Margaret O'Neill|Maureen Lyster|Eliza Dear|Brendan Conroy|Tara McNamee|Liam O Mochain
title: Círculo de amigos
